body:
@davecheney yep. My bisection finally finished and pointed the finger at one of these commits:

https://github.com/golang/go/commit/20a10e7ddd1b2305f1279043ec281301c9199359
https://github.com/golang/go/commit/ad6ee36cac122894f7ea4043289c10a50e48ac01
https://github.com/golang/go/commit/d369f97342db25a6edd204ff938baa43d2f0ca5d

Do you think that there is a separate `math/rand` regression, or should we just convert this issue to track fixing that TODO?
